name: @hudlow/cel-parser
description: TypeScript parser for the Common Expression Language that parses expressions to a Protobuf-based abstract syntax tree, but does not execute them.
author: Dan Hudlow

scripts.clean: rm -rf index.ts index.ast utility/extract-parser-tests/bin dist/ external/ node_modules/ &> /dev/null
scripts.generate-parser: peggy cel.peggy --format bare --extra-options '{"typescript":true}' --plugin peggy-ts -o ./index.ts && prettier index.ts --write
scripts.bundle-browser: echo 'import * as CEL from "./"; module.exports = CEL;' | esbuild --bundle --global-name=CEL --outfile=dist/index.js && prettier dist/index.js --write
scripts.bundle-debugger: echo 'import toDebugString from "./utility/debug/to-debug-string.ts"; module.exports = toDebugString;' | esbuild --bundle --global-name=toDebugString --outfile=dist/to-debug-string.js && prettier dist/to-debug-string.js --write
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle-init && npm run bundle-cjs && npm run bundle-browser
scripts.extract-tests: npm run extract-conformance-tests && npm run extract-parser-tests
scripts.prepare: npm run generate-proto && npm run generate-parser && npm run bundle
scripts.verify: npm run lint && npm run check && npm test
